lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To roll on the table, your soul must be able.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I call it, No More Bull Sheet, How to Put the Playa in Player Character.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I want you to write down your mother's maiden name.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Um! Nat 20, is this some sort of scam?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Start by writing down your Gmail password and ATM pin.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I can tell you more for just $3,000.

lines.name: SPEAKERVOICE
lines.text: We have an arrest warrant of federal embezzlement and wire fraud--

lines.name: SPEAKERVOICE
lines.text: Take off the dice costume and surrender.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Remember, find out more and enter to win the contest at DnDBeyond.link/Twitter and maybe don't mention that you know me, okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This episode is sponsored by Bethesda and ZeniMax Online Studios, and their 2021 release of Elder Scrolls Online: Blackwood--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Watch the stream tomorrow, that's Friday, May 28th at 4:00pm Pacific on Twitch, or the VOD on YouTube this Sunday, May 30th.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Speaking of Laura, Laura, you got some things to talk about.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I just got this one little thing to say.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whooping) So I'm just going to tell you, this semi-cooperative board game, you'll play factions of sailors trying to be the last to survive the great leviathan, Uk'otoa.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can get your very own copy of Uk'otoa right now at Critical Role online shops, as well as Darrington Press Guild stores.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, the tone of the spot changed a couple of times.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is tentacle-based, so I don't know if that's the tone to strike.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But it'll also be available shortly at other local game stores across the US, and obviously, we highly support you supporting your local game stores, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Ashley, you got something to talk about.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter) To learn more about our campaign to build a writers' room for students at Venice High School here in Los Angeles, or to donate, head on over to criticalrolefoundation.org.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Give it love, give it love!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I believe that's the end of our announcements, y'all, so--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We need more announcements to make!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's go ahead and jump into--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you all descend into this chamber, tell me where you are at the moment, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matt, do we see any magic shops or potion dealers around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord, where would you like to be?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ah! Don't start with me! I would like to be--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, hiding behind there? So kind of low to the ground?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Assuming that the party's over here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't know. We're going to see him last.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no, no, but you said when we came down, we saw him. He was--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm getting us to that point, so you guys are placed where you want to be placed before you know where and how this happened.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So my narrative end to the last episode is now being rewound and reintroduced for the sake of the strategic placement of this battle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Actually, I take it back, I want to be right here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You assume so, since you're all flying down into the chamber.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus, where would you like to be?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's what I get, I suppose.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus, where would you like to be?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In between the little, weird, bulbous--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, just in the corner right there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, near that coral reef thing, between the bulb and the coral reef.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester, where would you like to be?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't know if we can fly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to have floated down, and I'm going to be on the dome with the little spike over here, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, on top of the dome?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me just-- takes a little bit of--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Veth, where would you like to be?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, we all descended sort of together, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all descended together, and you found your placement as you begin to take in the scene below, so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think I would be, maybe, in front of Jester, near that-- I don't want to be crude, but penis-looking thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you want to be closer to the ground, higher up?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, maybe right there's good, just 10 feet off the ground seems good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And we don't see Lucien anywhere yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is something in the center of this area on the ground that is gently glowing and shifting.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, am I seeing-- No. This weird little pillar thing? I'll go near that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, do you want to be on the ground, or still floating, 10, 20 feet up? What do you want?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we get an action here? Or we're just being placed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, if you want to take an action as you're getting down there, you can.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to pull out the other field generator and crack it, and throw it into the center of this mess.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, I would definitely, if we can do that as we're coming down, I would've Invoked Duplicity again, my last one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I imagine I would've invoked her as we came in, and she would've floated down to the opposite, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's got to be within 130 feet of me, so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (vocalizing) ♪ I can't find-- ♪ What about right there? Can you see where I'm putting it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I would've cast Mage Hand, if we get an action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me go ahead and find a hand for you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are we floating, or are we on fleshy bits?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you would've been paying attention--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We're floating. I know, I know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which, on that note, where would you like to be, Yasha?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think I'll get at the end of that spiral staircase thing, at the end of those little rocks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're going to float? 10 feet up, 20 feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just getting you all to the heights you wanted.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, where would you like to be?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The building on your left side, DM, not at the tippy top of it, but on that second step down, I would be floating five feet above the surface of that level.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I could be dead in 20 minutes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Essek is going to be drifting--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you all descend into place--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- you watch as the ground begins to split open.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It widens out as large tusk-like teeth or horns emerge from parts of the body, and where the stalks of the Somnovem once resided, now you see these large, curved, claw-like flesh wings that protrude from the back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look at the shit coming out of the back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to see it so much closer up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Zoom in! Zoom the fuck in! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I also need you all to roll initiative.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, can we not see his eyes anymore, then? Does he not have the eyes? Not that we see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The eyes are not on the back, no, you don't see them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, he looks like that--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, what did you just roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Essek is actually going at the same time as Beau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What was it? What'd you say, Caleb?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, Caleb, Caduceus, because Caduceus has a lower dex of the two of you, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, DM, as everyone was situating, you were allowing people to do one last thing to prepare for the battle, is that correct?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb is going to cast Mirror Image.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's eyes, there's eyes on the giant--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On the pillar, on the dick!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's eyes all over this place.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you buy a pack of googly eyes and just stick them all over?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "What are you doing in there, Matt?" "Nothing!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it was a lot of that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: By the way, Marisha, Beau, you're up first.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know what to do!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lucien is just emerging from this now, and like, (exhales).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm just going to go: Okay! And then run forward, full forward. (zooming)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, rushing straight up to the newly-emerged Lucien, Cognouza Incarnate.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Actually, we could just punch the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, and I have an extra 2d8.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could be hitting him then, too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 14, plus another, 21 on the first one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, chill, chill, chill, I feel like I have to pee already, and that can't be possible.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know, I just went. I feel it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Seven plus seven is 14, plus eight is 22, plus one is 23.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go ahead and do a Flurry of Blows, though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That first one is 27 to hit?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm just going to do damage on that one first.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Second one, okay, and the second one, I rolled a 17 to hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do an Extract Aspects, though?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And just in case anything has changed with him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still resistant to fire and necrotic, still immune to psychic, being charmed, frightened, and stunned, so nothing has changed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you can be conscious of that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And you cracked one of those flash-bangs, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As she arrived down, so, should there be the zone, which has not kicked in yet, it seems, it is not present.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because he can use any eye on the map.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, finishing Beau's turn, that brings us to Essek's go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You just want to get hit first, and then you're ready to go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's just like a capella group, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just want to hit that first note, then you're fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Beauregard goes in and unleashes this barrage, he seems still in this euphoric state of emergence, and almost takes no notice of the blows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (lightning crashing) Still keeps smiling, and is just starting to notice your presence, like a babe opening its eyes for the first time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But it didn't bounce off or anything, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It seemed to take damage, as expected.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's got the hit points of a city behind him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why would you be concerned about a few measly hit points? Yeah, that's exactly what it feels like.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does not succeed on a saving throw, and is going to let it fly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's got so many hit points, it doesn't matter!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I bet we are, we are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With a deep exhale, (exhales) "This (inhales) is what it was meant to be." "This (inhales) is what it was meant to be." And his face just goes dire and sinister.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's going to go ahead and Will Aether.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought he pointed at me, and I was like.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, I need you to go ahead and make a--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, he's throwing a statue at him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does the statue flew at Caduceus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He appeared to rake his hand through the air, and will it to strike towards--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will say, this was a very good roll for me, 16.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I had a funny feeling.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is where dreams are possible, you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take 22 points of bludgeoning damage, and you are (grunts) taken off of your platform, and pinned against the ground over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you are restrained until you manage to break free, because you are now partially covered by the statue.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And it's a statue, it's not like a moving statue.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then it's a wisdom save for a spell, for concentration?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's a constitution saving throw, but you have advantage, and the DC is half the damage you took.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Holy Fists of Beauregard fade.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I got to tap you to redo it, so I need to get in close if I need to--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If I'm going to bring that back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is good, this is good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How would you describe my current state?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are currently knocked out of the air as the statue impacts and then slams you into the building across that way, and you are pinned now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The statue is crushing you against the rooftop of a slightly emerging structure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was curious if there was a technical, if it was grappled, or--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, the second bit is going to be Nightmare Cage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) After he finishes chucking the statue.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He smiles, and glances around the battlefield, and looks over towards Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From the ground beneath you, a small, fleshy tether, shoots up like a tendril--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do have advantage because you can see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Minus your number of eyes, if you have any.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And Yasha's by the stairs, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, right, she has no eyes? Yasha and Jester have no eyes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to end Lucien's turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing in the nightmare?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I rage right now, or no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then what do you want to do in this nightmare?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to rage, and I'm going to look at Zuala, and say: You're not real, you're not real.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With advantage because you do have the--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm just looking at this in the middle, and it's not changing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) If I pick it up, it might change.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Finishing Yasha's go, first lair action happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need everybody except for Yasha, who is not mentally present, to make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That Heroes' Feast saved your ass.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, wait, but minus eyes, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How many eyes am I at?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I rolled a 18, and then a 17.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I had 21, but it's down to 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, the pattern doesn't seem to take hold.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh no, it's going to stick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The pattern, you all managed to avert your gaze, and recognizing what this may be, and do not allow the continued corruption of the Somnovem to leak into you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So with that, it is now Veth's go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The very what of the Astral Sea? The very what of the Astral Sea is ripe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the air itself seems to buzz with potential.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't want to do this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're using your bonus action to attempt to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lucien is still conducting with this newfound connection with the entire city, not just the Somnovem, and didn't listen to a single word you said.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, hearing no response, I will pop out and shoot a crossbow bolt at him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't have advantage, but he's with Beau.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But, because I'm using my ASC, my Aeorian Security Cannon, I'm going to command the bolt to come back, and shoot it, and direct it back, and try again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't have to reduce by eyes, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the bolt, (whooshing) and just seems to come right back, and pierce Lucien in the side, so go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Plus seven is 36 points, 36 points of damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll just nook behind, back again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As one of the eyes of the Somnovem emerges from the ground, tethered to the floor, and, with that, you can see.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's got century guns, you guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So wait, he just summoned that from the flesh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It seemed to emerge from the ground nearby.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He just did that in between the turns.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And he aims straight at me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you were just outside of the cone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Unless you get out of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Up here, at the top, another eye appears.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, yeah, they can appear anywhere.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is the worst magic show ever.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we each get a eye pointed at us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beauregard, I need you to go ahead--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you feel the imploring draw of the eye of Gaudius to bring its love to you and yours to it, you shrug it off, but not before an additional eye is added to your body.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What eye came out and looked at me? Do I know which eye that was?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That one? It's written on there, it's fine. It's Vigilan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Vigilan? Oh, we don't-- Oh, we don't know that one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was the one we didn't get.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I would know that I don't recognize it as one that we mentioned.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: ♪ Do you know the Vigilan eye ♪

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Luctus is going to go ahead and glance over towards-- Towards you, Veth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Since you are hiding from Lucien, but not from the direction of Luctus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you to go ahead and make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Luctus is the one that's up on the-- yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's because I farted that time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) You are considered slowed for the time being, much like you were the last time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You got a better dex than I do though, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you move at half speed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Timorei, who's over on that hill right there--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do they all get to go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Timorei is the one that's right over there on the middle of that thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And as he shakes his head, you see as an eye appears in his throat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no! I don't understand. Regardless of if you shake it off, you still get the eye?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Only some of the eyes, Yeah, yeah, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not all of them but a few of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a timer on this battle, y'all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to finish the Eyes of the Somnovem's turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, you're up. Caduceus, you're on deck.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I am going to focus on the eyes on the different points of my body and imagine a large flesh and stone version of the glaive that Lorenzo used to murder Mollymauk and try to summon it into the air above him and stab down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a wisdom check. Roll a d20, add your wisdom modifier, add the number of eyes you have.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you have advantage because the air is crackling with the aether of potential.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll an attack with me using your spell attack modifier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits, go ahead and roll 3d12 plus your spell modifier.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Without having to use a spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30 points of damage to Lucien as the glaive sinks into the body, before it vanishes, no longer held in the will.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right before it went, on the side of the glaive an eye went-- bulged open and (whoosh).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you have anything you want to do with your bonus action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or you making your bonus action as part of--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The bonus action were the words to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then go ahead and make a persuasion check as well with that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now is not the time for minotaur sex, okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. With the end of Caleb's turn, that brings it to Caduceus. Jester, you're on deck.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, I am currently restrained by a giant statue.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not to the point where it's damaging you, but you cannot move at the moment.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, and what would it be to try and get out of this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Restrained just means you can't move and any attack rolls you make are with disadvantage, attacks against you have advantage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who's within 30 feet of me? Nobody.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Essek is going to make another wisdom saving throw with advantage, and succeeds.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many is that for Essek now, do we know?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anybody have more than four? Three of us have four, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there anyone or anything within 30 feet of me? Or 60 for that matter, I'm just trying to get an idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just know that Jester is currently in a space of anti-magic right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I feel like it's been a year since we started the fight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In the Astral Sea, it could have been.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That should get me unlocked from this thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, I'm casting Freedom of Movement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're no longer restrained and your movement will not be restrained for as long as that continues to go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that--? Oh yeah, okay, okay, okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So with the rest of my turn, I'm--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still have your movement, if you'd like to move.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to take my movement to try and scoot behind that temple over there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
